      public void checkForMatches​(int numberOfPlayers)

    • getWaitingPlayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getWaitingPlayers​(int numberOfPlayers)
      synchronized method that inspects the queue of waiting players and filters it using the number of players
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players we want to filter the queue
      Returns:
      a list containing all players that wants to play a match with two players

    • addWaitingPlayers

      public void addWaitingPlayers​(Player player, java.lang.Integer numberOfPlayers)
      synchronized method that adds a new connected player to the waiting players queue
      Parameters:
      player - the new connected player
      numberOfPlayers - the number that defines what match he wants to play

    • removeWaitingPlayers

      public void removeWaitingPlayers​(Player player)
      synchronized method that removes a player from the waiting players list
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to be removed

    • removeWaitingPlayers

      public void removeWaitingPlayers​(java.lang.String username)
      overloaded version of the previous method synchronized method that removes a player from the waiting players list finding him using the username
      Parameters:
      username - the username of player that has to be removed

    • addVirtualClient

      public void addVirtualClient​(java.lang.String username, ClientNetworkHandler handler)
      synchronized method that adds a new connected client to the virtual clients map
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the client connected
      handler - the network handler associated to that client, used to communicate with the client

    • removeVirtualClient

      Parameters:

      Returns:
